de.dfki.adom.rest

Interface MemoryAccess

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OMMBinding, OmsAdomBinding

    public interface MemoryAccess
    Handles access to a memory and its management properties.
    Author:
    Christian Hauck

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteMemory(java.lang.String memoryName)
      Deletes a memory from the OMS.
      de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMM getMemory(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the OMM memory of the given name if such a OMM exists, null else.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMemoryNames()
      Returns a Set of Strings containing the names of all existing memories.
      de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMBlock getOwnerBlock(java.lang.String memoryName)
      Retrieves information about an object memory's owner.
      boolean IsDeleteDisabled(java.lang.String memoryName)
      Checks whether memory deletion is allowed.
      void setOwnerBlock(java.lang.String memoryName, de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMBlock ommBlock)
      Sets or replaces an object memory's owner.

        Returns:

      • IsDeleteDisabled

        boolean IsDeleteDisabled(java.lang.String memoryName)
        Checks whether memory deletion is allowed.
        Parameters:
        memoryName - The name of the memory to check.
        Returns:
        True, if memory cannot be deleted.

      • getOwnerBlock

        de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMBlock getOwnerBlock(java.lang.String memoryName)
        Retrieves information about an object memory's owner.
        Parameters:
        memoryName - The name of the memory to check.
        Returns:
        Owner information in fom of an OMMBlock.

      • setOwnerBlock

        void setOwnerBlock(java.lang.String memoryName,
                   de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMBlock ommBlock)
        Sets or replaces an object memory's owner.
        Parameters:
        memoryName - The name of the memory of which the owner is set.
        ommBlock - New owner information as an OMMBlock.

      • deleteMemory

        void deleteMemory(java.lang.String memoryName)
        Deletes a memory from the OMS.
        Parameters:
